/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/simple_fog.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simple_fog.dir/src/example.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simple_fog.dir/src/glxwindow.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simple_fog.dir/src/targa.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simple_fog.dir/src/terrain.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simple_fog.dir/src/glee/GLee.c.o  -o simple_fog -rdynamic -L"/media/OS/Users/luke/Desktop/BOGLGP Source/boglgp/Source/OpenGL 3.0/chapter_8/simple_fog/lib" -lGL -lGLU -lXxf86vm -Wl,-rpath,"/media/OS/Users/luke/Desktop/BOGLGP Source/boglgp/Source/OpenGL 3.0/chapter_8/simple_fog/lib"
